price: Afoforͻ bi nso wͻ hͻ a yɛabͻ wͻn ato hͻ ama Nyankopͻn ahyεdeε no; sε Ɔbεtwe wͻn aso, anaasε Ɔde bεkyε wͻn. Nyankopͻn ne Onimdefoͻ a Ɔnim biribiara, na Ɔne Onyansafoͻ.
arabic: وَءَاخَرُونَ مُرۡجَوۡنَ لِأَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِ إِمَّا يُعَذِّبُهُمۡ وَإِمَّا يَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waākharūna mur'jawna li-amri al-lahi immā yuʿadhibuhum wa-immā yatūbu ʿalayhim wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
